Class Enquiry

java.lang.Object
Enquiry
public class Enquiry extends Object
Entity.

This class represents an enquiry made by an applicant regarding a specific project. Each enquiry has a unique ID, a message, an optional response, and tracks whether it has been answered.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private boolean
    answered
    Flag indicating whether the enquiry has been answered.
    private int
    id
    Unique identifier for this enquiry.
    private static int
    instanceCount
    Static counter to assign unique IDs to each enquiry instance.
    private String
    message
    The message content of the enquiry.
    private Project
    project
    The project to which this enquiry relates.
    private String
    response
    The response to the enquiry, if any.
    private Applicant
    user
    The applicant who made the enquiry.

      Static counter to assign unique IDs to each enquiry instance.

      Unique identifier for this enquiry.

      The message content of the enquiry.

      The response to the enquiry, if any.

  • Constructor Details

    • Enquiry

      Enquiry(Applicant user, Project project)
      Constructs a new enquiry for the given applicant and project. Automatically assigns a unique ID and initializes the enquiry as unanswered.
      Parameters:
      user - the Applicant who made the enquiry
      project - the Project the enquiry is about

  • Method Details

    • getID

      public int getID()
      Returns the unique ID of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the enquiry ID

    • setMessage

      public void setMessage(String message)
      Sets the message content of this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      message - the enquiry message

    • getMessage

      public String getMessage()
      Returns the message content of this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the enquiry message

    • getResponse

      public String getResponse()
      Returns the response to this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the response message, or null if unanswered

    • setResponse

      public void setResponse(String response)
      Sets the response to this enquiry and marks it as answered.
      Parameters:
      response - the response message

    • getUser

      public Applicant getUser()
      Returns the applicant who made this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the Applicant user

    • getProject

      public Project getProject()
      Returns the project associated with this enquiry.
      Returns:
      the Project related to the enquiry

    • isAnswered

      public boolean isAnswered()
      Returns whether this enquiry has been answered.
      Returns:
      true if answered, false otherwise

    • setAnswered

      public void setAnswered(boolean answered)
      Sets the answered status of this enquiry.
      Parameters:
      answered - true to mark as answered, false otherwise

    • print

      public void print()
      Prints the enquiry details to the console. Displays the enquiry ID, project name, applicant name, message, and response if answered.
